author: Quran 13:28
quote: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.

author: Quran 58:11
quote: Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees.

author: Quran 93:11
quote: And as for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it.

author: Quran 29:57
quote: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us you will be returned.

author: Quran 25:53
quote: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter.

author: Quran 99:7-8
quote: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it, and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.

author: Quran 2:153
quote: Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

author: Quran 49:13
quote: Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you.

author: Quran 39:9
quote: Are those who know equal to those who do not know?

author: Quran 13:28
quote: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured.

author: Quran 3:134
quote: Those who restrain their anger and pardon people - and Allah loves the doers of good.

author: Quran 50:18
quote: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

author: Quran 39:53
quote: Say, O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

author: Quran 94:6
quote: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

author: Quran 24:22
quote: And let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you?

author: Quran 51:56
quote: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

author: Quran 16:43
quote: So ask the people of knowledge if you do not know.

author: Quran 20:131
quote: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them.

author: Quran 4:95
quote: Not equal are those who remain [behind] and those who strive in the cause of Allah.

author: Quran 103:3
quote: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

author: Quran 16:70
quote: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death.

author: Quran 3:185
quote: Every soul will taste death, and you will only be given your [full] compensation on the Day of Resurrection.

author: Quran 39:42
quote: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die [He takes] during their sleep.

author: Quran 29:69
quote: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

author: Quran 58:22
quote: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger.

author: Quran 41:30
quote: Indeed, those who have said, 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remained steadfast - the angels will descend upon them.

author: Quran 96:1
quote: Read in the name of your Lord who created.

author: Quran 2:286
quote: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

author: Quran 94:5-6
quote: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease. Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

author: Quran 33:21
quote: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern.

author: Quran 3:159
quote: And if you had been rude [in speech] and harsh in heart, they would have disbanded from about you.

author: Quran 5:2
quote: And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression.

author: Quran 9:105
quote: And say, 'Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds.'

author: Quran 57:20
quote: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another.
And We have certainly made the Qur’an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
author: Quran 54:17

quote: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
author: Quran 94:6

quote: And your Lord is the Forgiving, Full of Mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment.
author: Quran 18:58

quote: And He found you lost and guided [you].
author: Quran 93:7

quote: So verily, with the hardship, there is relief.
author: Quran 94:5

quote: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins.
author: Quran 39:53

quote: Indeed, Allah does not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.
author: Quran 13:11

quote: And say: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
author: Quran 20:114

quote: And whoever fears Allah – He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect.
author: Quran 65:2-3

quote: And rely upon Allah, and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
author: Quran 33:3

quote: Indeed, Allah is with those who are patient.
author: Quran 2:153

quote: And when My servants ask you concerning Me, indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.
author: Quran 2:186

quote: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam.
author: Quran 17:70

quote: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
author: Quran 2:286

quote: Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
author: Quran 40:60

quote: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.
author: Quran 17:37

quote: Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing.
author: Quran 29:45

quote: Say, ‘Nothing will ever befall us except what Allah has decreed for us; He is our Protector.’ And upon Allah let the believers rely.
author: Quran 9:51

quote: And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided.
author: Quran 3:103

quote: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient.
author: Quran 2:155
